## *Tackle Your R Analysis* ##

<br/>

tyRA is an R package to facilitate building models from 16S rRNA amplicon data. <br/>

<br/>

To Install:

```
install.packages("devtools")

library(devtools)

install_github("DanielSprockett/tyRa")
```
<br/>

This package is under active development, so please let me know if you run into any issues.
